comment: Tough teacher but I got a ton out of her class but be prepared to earn your grade.

The point system in this class is what kills your grade if you miss points - large assignments are worth 5-15 points, while quizzes and discussion posts are worth 4. This is not a way to handle graduate level grades - we've already worked hard to get where we are and she makes it tough to like the program by lack of transparency when grading.
Instructor came to teach late in semester and caught up quickly without and excuses. Loves participation.
